summary: This document is an email chain forwarded by attorney Stacey Richman, containing a threatening text message sent to Mark L. Epstein on May 24, 2020. The message accuses the recipient of having sex with children and threatens death, indicating ongoing harassment related to the Epstein case.

keyFacts: Mark L. Epstein received a threatening text message on May 24, 2020 accusing him of having sex with children and threatening death.
Attorney Stacey Richman forwarded the email containing this threatening message on May 25, 2020.
The message suggests Mark L. Epstein was being harassed or targeted in connection with allegations of child sexual abuse.
The document shows ongoing fallout and harassment related to the Epstein case years after Jeffrey Epstein's death.
The communication includes a standard attorney confidentiality notice, suggesting legal handling of the threat.
